pkgmetadata.longdescription: Genalyze is a script that collects system information in a text file and uploads it to a pastebin service. Still in heavy development, visit #gentoo-genalyze on freenode to help! Actual maintainers of the script and ebuild are godmachine-x6 and smartass101, this ebuild is marked as maintained by kahrl@gmx.net only because it's in the kahrl overlay.
